interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Japan 100gram 3Cup Size Must Up Breast & Butt Enlargment Cream Pueraria Mirifica (3 Tubes 100g)
Review Date: 2016/03/04
Store: Must Up
Product Description: ['Correct Massage Techniques: Step 1: Spread the cream to the breast all around. Step 2: The body slightly to bend down, both hands pat the breast base, and upwardly pushes 10 times of each. Step 3: Pushes from the armpit to the cleavage 10 times of each. Step 4: With the middle finger and the ring finger, pulls several times of the chest ligament, is helpful to strength the breast and enhancement. Tips : 1) During the first week of using, massage twice a day in the morning and at night. 2) It is more effective to use the cream after taking a bath. 3) When your bust becomes fuller, remember to wear bras that fit and massage your bust every day.']
Average Rating: 3.2
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Weight': '100 Grams', 'Package Information': 'Tube', 'Package Dimensions': '6.7 x 4.2 x 1.7 inches; 3.53 Ounces', 'Date First Available': 'December 30, 2013', 'Manufacturer': 'Must Up'}
Review Text: I like it I used the whole cream, I did not really see a different in size of my boobs or my butt, but it did make for a good moisturizer, which always helps with stretch marks.
Review Title: meh not bad, not good
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Category**: Enthusiastic about hair extensions, particularly fond of color and texture variations, especially ombre styles. Recently deepened interest in body enhancement creams, reflecting a growing focus on personal care beyond hair.
  
- **Preferences**: Prefers high-quality, thicker extensions made from natural materials, valuing durability alongside creative color combinations. Recently purchased a body cream that, while not effective for size enhancement, served well as a moisturizer, highlighting a practical skincare approach.
  
- **Hair Type**: Engages with products suitable for various hair types, including wavy, curly, oily, dry, and normal textures.
  
- **Review Behavior**: Provides balanced feedback, appreciating strengths like thickness and versatility, while addressing weaknesses such as tangling in curly extensions. Rated a body product moderately, noting its effectiveness as a moisturizer despite lacking its intended enhancement effects.
  
- **Trends**: Actively seeks diverse color options for hair extensions and is exploring skincare solutions, demonstrating a commitment to comprehensive personal enhancement.
  
- **Quality Criteria**: Emphasizes overall quality and thickness in hair extensions, while appreciating effectiveness in skincare products. Recognizes common product challenges and prioritizes practical benefits.
  
- **Overall Attitude**: Maintains a positive outlook on purchases, willing to explore new products and colors, reflecting an ongoing engagement with beauty and personal care.
